relation: I've never had a problem or weird experience on campus. I have a late night class when almost everything is closed up and it's always felt really safe.
We have a lot of great athletic teams to watch and performing arts.
Personally, I try to avoid the cafe at all times.
Unfortunately, I don't live in the dorms, but I've heard they're nice.
It depends on the class you take so IDK how to answer this one.

Get an advisor and ask every question you have. Then ask general questions to try to pick up on anything you missed. Finally, when you're all out of questions ask a little more incase. I know I could have made things a bit easier on myself if I'd bothered to ask the right questions.
I like it there. It's not perfect but no college is. They're very clear about what you have to do to get your degree.
pageTitle: Iowa Western Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {110856=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 94087=It is not to bad, but recently within the last two years the food has been under cooked/Raw. Cold French Fires, and weird Drinks that smell like Rodent/Skunk Spray.(Drink the Fountain drinks(Coke/Pepsi Products). Pizza that tastes like Rubber. that was spring of 2013 - spring of 2014' the fall of 2014 was better but the drinks were still bad. still go for the Fountain Drinks(Pepsi/Coke) at least the fruit is good. fruit bowl and physical fruit., 86423=I am an online student in Moore, Oklahoma. I was involved in the Moore, Oklahoma tornado in 2013. With that said, it was a devastation in Moore that everything was hit, including all houses within a mile of my house. Altogether, during the time I was cleaning up and transitioning into a new home and rebuilding my city and home- Iowa Western professors and other employees at IWCC were flexible with me and helped me complete my classes in a orderly manor. No, they did not give me special treatment- but they did give me forgiveness. When the tornado happened they were truly understandable and gave me an extent on a the assignments that were due for that week and the next week. They are truly encouraging and did nothing but encourage me to try my best and they easily tested my knowledge.}
